items.sentence: We were hoping for some time alone together.
We were unaware that we were being recorded.
I should\'ve told Tom why he had to do that.
Tom and Mary want to know what\'s happening.
The slaves were finally given their freedom.
Tom still doesn\'t trust Mary all that much.
Tom spent the entire day cleaning the house.
Tom was with an old friend from high school.
Tom was working in his office up until noon.
I have no intention of giving Tom any money.
How many Canadians do you have working here?
How many times have you done that this year?
Tom is worried about his children\'s health.
I didn\'t know that you were Tom\'s brother.
Tom didn\'t know what he was supposed to do.
Tom doesn\'t have to buy anything right now.
Tom doesn\'t have to worry about me anymore.
We need to sleep at least seven hours a day.
How did you know that Tom wouldn\'t do that?
This is the third time I\'ve been to Boston.
